text: Jakob "Jack" Günthard (8 January 1920 – 7 August 2016) was a Swiss artistic gymnast. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, where he won the gold medal in the horizontal bar, and the silver medal in the team combined exercises."1952 Summer Olympics - Helsinki, Finland - Gymnastics" databaseOlympics.com (Retrieved on 28 March 2008) Günthard died on 7 August 2016 at the age of 96.Swiss gymnastics legend Jack Günthard dies. swissinfo.ch (8 August 2016) == References == Category:1920 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Swiss gymnasts Category:Medalists at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for Switzerland Category:Olympic silver medalists for Switzerland Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Zürich
title: Jack Günthard
